reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Reduction of HIV transmission and HIV-related morbidity, mortality, disability and social and economic impact in Myanmar

description.narrative: Myanmar - HIV - United Nations Office for Project Services - UNOPS. This program has the following goals: To further reduce HIV transmission and HIV-related morbidity, mortality, disability and social and economic impact of HIV. The objectives of this program are: Reduce HIV incidence among priority populations and their partners. Improve quality of care and accessibility for ART. Ensure viral suppression for all People Living with HIV. Improve the enabling environment to support the national HIV response
